page.title: 14Penny's Days 3
page.content: Got up at twenty past seven. Played on computer game.Got dressed and went downstairs to get breakfast. I had two slices of toast, a cup of tea and some fresh orange. Watched t.v. until Mum and my sisters, Rebecca and Catherine got back from shopping. Played out with Sharon Greer. Came home to watch a programme on t.v. called 'Live Aid.' Watched a film on t.v. andthen I had two sausages, chips, beans and a drink of water for tea. After I had a 'Mr. Frosty' ice drink. Dad gave me some sweets called Banana Whirls. I watched a film on t.v. then I went to bed anddid a puzzle until ten o'clock(p.m.).
